user.title: Smartly Bridge Setup
user.description: Configure the Smartly Bridge integration. A unique client ID and secret will be automatically generated for secure communication with your Smartly Platform.

data_description.instance_id: A unique identifier for this Home Assistant instance (e.g., community_001)
data_description.webhook_url: The URL where state changes will be pushed (e.g., https://platform.example.com/webhooks/ha-events)
data_description.allowed_cidrs: Comma-separated list of allowed IP ranges in CIDR format (e.g., 10.0.0.0/8,192.168.1.0/24). Leave empty to allow all IPs.
data_description.push_batch_interval: How often to batch and send state changes (default: 0.5 seconds)

error.invalid_cidr: Invalid CIDR format. Please use format like 10.0.0.0/8
error.invalid_url: Invalid URL. Must start with http:// or https://

init.title: Smartly Bridge Options
init.description:
Update Smartly Bridge settings.

**Credentials (read-only)**:
- Client ID: `{client_id}`
- Client Secret: `{client_secret}`

data_description.trust_proxy: Whether to trust X-Forwarded-For header. Auto-detect (Recommended): Automatically determines if behind a proxy. Always trust: Use when behind trusted reverse proxy like Nginx/Caddy. Never trust: Use when directly exposed to internet.
